Source.Name: libdmapsharing
Source.Summary: Libdmapsharing is a library which allows programs to access, share and control the playback of media content using DMAP (DAAP, DPAP & DACP).
Source.Description: Libdmapsharing is a library which allows programs to access, share and control the playback of media content using DMAP (DAAP, DPAP & DACP).
